key.name: forced-mode
key.summary: Flag to control if temperature is always displayed
key.description: If Optimus Manager is not available you could force the extension to show GPU temperature even if some capabilities are not available

key.name: dynamic-hybrid-icon
key.summary: Flag to control if the icon in hybrid mode would be static or not
key.description: If the flag is true and GPU and Memory utilization are in 0% intel icon would be set if they are greater than 0% nvidia icon would be set

key.name: show-gpu-temperature
key.summary: Flag to control if the GPU temperature is displayed
key.description: If the flag is true the GPU Temperature would be displayed in the panel

key.name: show-gpu-utilization
key.summary: Flag to control if the GPU utilization is displayed
key.description: If the flag is true the GPU utilization icon and current state would be displayed in the panel

key.name: show-gpu-memory-utilization
key.summary: Flag to control if the GPU Memory utilization is displayed
key.description: If the flag is true the GPU Memory utilization icon and current state would be displayed in the panel
